reviewText: A bunch of poor movie. Some good one.
great movies for you to enjoy

This isn't really a review. I just feel that Amazon doesn't give enough information about this DVD collection. I'm adding this so any potential buyer might to be able to make an informed purchasing decision. I hope it's useful.

Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers (1995) - 88 min - Horror / Thriller - Director: Joe Chappelle - Stars: Donald Pleasence, Paul Rudd and Marianne Hagan.

The Prophecy II (Video 1998) - 87 min - Fantasy / Horror / Thriller - Director: Greg Spence - Stars: Christopher Walken, Russell Wong and Jennifer Beals.

Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth (1992) - 91 min - Horror - Director: Anthony Hickox - Stars: Terry Farrell, Doug Bradley and Kevin Bernhardt.

Dracula III: Legacy (Video 2005) - 86 min - Horror - Director: Patrick Lussier - Stars: Jason Scott Lee, Stephen Billington and Diane Neal.

eXistenZ (1999) - 97 min - Horror / Sci-Fi / Thriller - Director: David Cronenberg - Stars: Jude Law, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Ian Holm.

Children of the Corn 666: Isaac's Return (Video 1999) - 82 min - Horror / Mystery / Thriller - Director: Kari Skogland - Stars: Natalie Ramsey, Gary Bullock and Alix Koromzay.

Darkness (2002) - 102 min - Horror - Director: Jaume Balaguer - Stars: Anna Paquin, Lena Olin and Iain Glen.

War of the Worlds 2: The Next Wave (Video 2008) - 87 min - Action / Adventure / Sci-Fi - Director: C. Thomas Howell - Stars: C. Thomas Howell, Christopher Reid and Kim Little.

Monster (Video 2008) - 86 min - Action / Horror / Thriller - Director: Erik Estenberg - Stars: Erin Evans, Sarah Lieving and Justin L. Jones.

Live Animals (2008) - 84 min - Horror - Director: Jeremy Benson - Stars: John Still, Christian Walker and Jeanette Comans.

Paranormal Entity (Video 2009) - 88 min - Horror / Mystery / Thriller - Director: Shane Van Dyke - Stars: Shane Van Dyke, Erin Marie Hogan and Fia Perera.

Invasion of the Pod People (Video 2007) - 85 min - Sci-Fi / Thriller - Director: Justin Jones - Stars: Erica Roby, Jessica Bork and Sarah Lieving.

Howling IV: The Original Nightmare (Video 1988) - 94 min - Horror - Director: John Hough - Stars: Romy Windsor, Michael T. Weiss and Antony Hamilton.

The Apocalypse (Video 2007) - 94 min - Adventure / Drama / Sci-Fi - Director: Justin Jones - Stars: Rhett Giles, Jill Stapley and Kristen Quintrall.

Mortuary (2005) - 94 min - Horror / Mystery / Thriller - Director: Tobe Hooper - Stars: Dan Byrd, Denise Crosby and Rocky Marquette.

Echo Bridge Home Entertainment, the company that produces this DVD, gives the following synopses for each film. I take no credit for writing them. I've just included them as a courtesy.

HALLOWEEN: THE CURSE OF MICHAEL MYERS
Six years after he was presumed dead in a fire, Michael Myers has returned to kill again.

THE PROPHECY II
With the help of a mysterious stranger, an innocent woman races to protect her child from the powers of evil and save all of humanity.

HELLRAISER III: HELL ON EARTH
An ambitious TV reporter discovers the Lament Configuration Box and now Pinhead walks the Earth again.

DRACULA III: LEGACY
Dracula leads vampire hunters Father Uffizi and Luke back to Eastern Europe where powerful warlords are assisting Dracula by capturing victims to feed to the vampires.

EXISTENZ
A virtual reality game's designer is violently attacked and real-life dangers begin to merge with fantasy.

CHILDREN OF THE CORN 666: ISAAC'S RETURN
On a trip to Gatlin, Nebraska to find her birth mother, Hannah picks up a dark stranger who kicks off a mysterious chain of events.

DARKNESS
Not long after Regina begins living in her family's remote country estate, she learns that there's something horribly disturbing about the old place.

WAR OF THE WORLDS 2: THE NEXT WAVE
When the aliens return to complete their plan of human domination, mankind unites in one last stand.

MONSTER
Footage of a catastrophic event in Japan reveals that it wasn't actually an earthquake...it was something else.

LIVE ANIMALS
A group of young adults are kidnapped and tortured and their attempt to escape leads to even more gruesome consequences.

PARANORMAL ENTITY
Samantha Finley and Edgar Lauren were murdered in 2008. This film proves that nothing human caused their deaths.

INVASION OF THE POD PEOPLE
After a woman's closest friends undergo extreme personality changes, she begins to suspect that they have been replaced by alien invaders.

HOWLING IV: THE ORIGINAL NIGHTMARE
Marie and her husband plan a relaxing getaway...but something sinister lurks in the light of the full moon.

THE APOCALYPSE
A mother and father search for their only child as a giant asteroid headed for Earth triggers a series of apocalyptic events.

MORTUARY
A family takes over a long-abandoned funeral home, only to discover that something evil lurks there.
